  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_43ecbf5baf7433b8b9bf1ea5a97f69c2148268e1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_43ecbf5baf7433b8b9bf1ea5a97f69c2148268e1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Orbit of Halley's comet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn von Kometen Halleys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orbite de la comète de Halley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita do cometa de Halley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orbita della cometa del Halley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τροχιά του κομήτη Halley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órbita del cometa de Halley</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the eccentric orbit of Halley's comet with respect to the solar system (a) and a comet's vapour tail growing as it nears the Sun (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">halley's comet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vapour tail</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Exzenterbahn 
von Kometen Halleys in Bezug auf das Solarsystem (a) und das wachsende
Dampfendstück eines Kometen, während es der Sonne (b) sich nähert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre l'orbite excentrique de la 
comète de Halley en ce qui concerne le système solaire (a) et la 
queue de la vapeur d'une comète accroissant pendant qu'il s'approche 
du soleil (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra a órbita excêntrica do 
cometa de Halley com respeito ao sistema solar (a) e à cauda do vapor
de um cometa que cresce enquanto aproxima o sol (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra l'orbita eccentrica della 
cometa del Halley riguardo al sistema solare (a) ed alla coda del 
vapore della cometa che cresce mentre avvicina il sole (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την εκκεντρική τροχιά του 
κομήτη Halley όσον αφορά το ηλιακό σύστημα (α) και την ουρά 
ατμού ενός κομήτη που αυξάνεται καθώς πλησιάζει στον ήλιο (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra la órbita excéntrica del 
cometa de Halley con respecto a la Sistema Solar (a) y a la cola del 
vapor de un cometa que crece mientras que acerca al sol (b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Komet der halleys</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solarsystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dampfendstück</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la comète des halley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système solaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le soleil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">queue de vapeur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cometa dos halley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cauda do vapor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cometa dei halley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coda del vapore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κομήτης halley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλιακό σύστημα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ήλιος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ουρά ατμού</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cometa de los halley</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sistema Solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cola del vapor</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
